## BibScan

This is an example of how to use the BibScan package. First, load the library.

```{r}
library(BibScan)
```

## Executing data

To batch download PDFs, tell the function where to retrieve the .bib file and where to download the PDFs.

```{r}
article_pdf_download(infilepath="data",outfilepath="data")
```
